sourcesContent:
import deleteInstant from "./deleteInstant"; import EditForm from "./EditForm"; /* - pass object info and mouseclick position to component - component is a div set at mouseclick position and displays object info as text */ function InfoBox({info, setInfo, history, setHistory, data, setData, src, setSrc}) { const target = info.target; var content = null; /* deleting point i: - find data[i-1] and set its target to data[i+1]. then remove data[i] from array - if data[i] is first point, just remove from array - if first point => just delete - prevNode exists but is not linked => just delete - prevNode exists and is linked, but no nextNode => set prevNode target to null, then delete - prevNode exists, is linked, and has next node => set prevNode target to nextNode, then delete - prevNode exists, is linked to multiple nodes => remove target node from prevNode, then delete */ const handleEdit = (e) => { } const handleDeleteInstant = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setHistory([...history, data]); deleteInstant(target, data, setData); setInfo(null); } switch (info.type) { case 'interval': content = <>
From:
To:
Color:
Width:
Opacity:
Dashed:



{target.width ? target.width : "1.67 (default)"}
{target.opacity ? target.opacity : "1"}
{target.dashed ? target.dashed : "N/A"}
break case 'zone': content = <> ID: {target.id}
Label: {target.name}
Time Start: {target.start}
Time End: {target.end}
Y Start: {target.yStart ? target.yStart : "N/A"}
Y End: {target.yEnd ? target.yEnd : "N/A"}
Color: {target.color ? target.color : "#999 (default)"}
Opacity: {target.opacity ? target.opacity : "0.5"}
break default: content = <> ID: {target[0]}
Time: {target[1].x}
Y Position: {target[1].y}
Target(s): {target[1].target ? target[1].target : "N/A"}
Color: {target[1].color ? target[1].color : "Black"}
Opacity: {target[1].opacity ? target[1].opacity : "1"}
Radius: {target[1].radius ? target[1].radius : "5 (default)"}
}; return (
{content}
); } export default InfoBox;
